comments: Hard class, moves fast and a lot of info to take in. Had to retake BRP 2 because I got lazy. If you stay on top of your work, study hard, and ask him questions (don\'t be afraid to, he notices who wants learn and digs it), you\'ll be fine. That said, one of the best teachers here. Hilarious, down-to-earth, very knowledgable. Favorite teacher
Class was very fast paced and hard to get a handle on, but Jimmy will answer any questions and is around to help often. Ask questions if you don\'t understand, because they will be on the exam.
This guy knows his stuff. Get to know him, cause he has tons of experience and is a down to earth dude.

Jimmy is awesome. He has a great sense of humor and is extremely passionate about recording and music. He\'s very experienced and knowledgeable. He does tend to talk fast, so if you don\'t understand something, ask him to repeat it. He won\'t mind.
